main event: On March 6, 1968, multiple witnesses reported observing unidentified flying objects near Amarillo, Texas.
interesting points: Reports were received from both civilians and military personnel., Observations included an unusual object that appeared to move at extreme speeds., One witness described the object as glowing and changing brightness., A weather inversion may have contributed to the visibility of the objects., No photographs or physical evidence were found to support the sightings.
witness description: Witnesses included a truck stop manager, a nurse, an airman, and a service station attendant.
